definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: One branch of western philosophy, Existentialism, is very similar to Buddhist ideas.
sentences.chinese: 而西方哲学的旁支，存在主义，同佛教十分相似。

sentences.english: These concepts are all well grounded in existentialist thought.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些概念都可以在存在主义中找到依据。

sentences.english: I remember this paper I wrote on existentialism.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我给存在主义写的这篇论文。

sentences.english: Rather, people share similar emotional reactions when faced with existential thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 相反，人们面对存在主义思想时有着相似的情感反应。

sentences.english: Kenzaburo Oe is a representative writer of Japanese existentialism literature.
sentences.chinese: 大江健三郎是日本存在主义文学的代表作家。

sentences.english: I took a test in Existentialism.
sentences.chinese: 我参加了一次存在主义的考试。

sentences.english: We have now, I think, dealt with a certain number of the reproaches against existentialism.
sentences.chinese: 我想，对于若干对存在主义的责难我们已经回答了。

sentences.english: I'm saying this more as, like, existentialism , you know?
sentences.chinese: 我多少是从存在主义的角度说的，你知道吗？
存在主义哲学对史铁生的影响。

sentences.english: And this philosophy is called existentialism in the western.
sentences.chinese: 而这种哲学在西方称为存在主义。

sentences.english: The existentialist understanding of this self-deception is living in Bad Faith.
sentences.chinese: 存在主义对自我欺骗的理解是不守信。

sentences.english: Existentialist writers say that in anguish we feel like we no longer exist.
sentences.chinese: 存在主义作家们说在苦痛中我们感觉不到自己的存在。

sentences.english: Does this mean procrastination is an existential issue?
sentences.chinese: 这是否意味着拖延是一个存在主义的问题？

sentences.english: I'm just providing an existential perspective on procrastination.
sentences.chinese: 我只是从存在主义的观点给拖延提供了一种解释。

sentences.english: Existentialism is a philosophy of choice.
sentences.chinese: 存在主义是一门关于选择的哲学。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
